backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining data types and CRUD operations for a food delivery app, including menu management, order placement/status updates, and customer profile storage using stable Maps with access control mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two implemented features: simplifying courier order cards to only Deliver/Delete buttons, and reducing order filter tabs to All/Pending/Delivered/Cancelled.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-to-two sentence summaries of each frontend source file, serving as a reference index for the project's frontend components, hooks, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens (background, foreground, primary, destructive, chart colors, sidebar, etc.).
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell titled 'The Deccan BHOJAN' that mounts the React app at the #root div and loads the main TSX entry point as an ES module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router setup defining two routes: a customer portal layout route at '/' and a standalone courier dashboard route at '/courier', then rendering via RouterProvider.
frontend/src/components/AccountView.tsx: Account management component that shows a login prompt for unauthenticated users or a profile form (name/phone) for authenticated users, using Internet Identity and React Query mutations.
frontend/src/components/CartPanel.tsx: Slide-in cart panel component displaying cart items with quantity controls and a checkout button, styled with an orange header and white item cards.
frontend/src/components/CheckoutForm.tsx: Renders a checkout form that collects customer name, phone, and notes, then places an order via mutation. Requires Internet Identity authentication; shows a sign-in prompt if the user is not logged in.
frontend/src/components/CourierPinGate.t: Displays a 4-digit OTP PIN entry screen to gate access to the courier dashboard. Shows a shake animation and error message on incorrect PIN entry.
frontend/src/components/CustomerNavigati: Sticky top navigation bar for the customer portal with links to Menu, My Orders, and Account views, a cart icon with item count badge, and an Internet Identity sign-in/sign-out button with mobile menu support.
frontend/src/components/CustomerPortalLa: Layout wrapper for the customer portal that renders child routes via an Outlet and includes a footer with copyright and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Reusable button component that handles Internet Identity login and logout, showing appropriate icons and a loading spinner during authentication.
frontend/src/components/MenuManagementSe: Admin UI section for managing menu items, supporting add, edit, toggle availability, and delete operations via React Query mutations with per-item loading states and dialog forms.
frontend/src/components/MenuSection.tsx: Displays a grouped category section of menu items as cards with add-to-cart and quantity increment/decrement controls based on current cart state.
frontend/src/components/MyOrdersView.tsx: Displays a customer's order history with auto-polling every 15 seconds, showing order status badges, timestamps, items, and totals in a sorted list.
frontend/src/components/OrderCard.tsx: Renders a single order card for admin/courier views with expandable item details, deliver and delete actions, and a delete confirmation banner.
frontend/src/components/OrderConfirmatio: Shows a live-polling order status tracker with a step-by-step progress indicator after a customer places an order, handling delivered, cancelled, and in-progress states.
frontend/src/components/OrderFilters.tsx: Renders a horizontal scrollable filter bar for orders by status (All, Pending, Delivered, Cancelled) with per-filter order counts.
frontend/src/components/OrderStatusBadge: Displays a styled pill badge for an order status with an optional animated dot, mapping OrderStatus enum values to labels and CSS classes.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog that collects a new user's name and phone number on first login and saves the profile via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Manages shopping cart state with sessionStorage persistence, exposing add, remove, update quantity, and clear operations along with total and item count.
frontend/src/hooks/useCourierAccess.ts: Controls PIN-based courier access with localStorage persistence, exposing grant and revoke functions that validate against a hardcoded PIN.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on the ICP platform, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient creation with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend interactions including menu CRUD operations, order fetching/mutation, and customer profile management using the actor from useActor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that sets up Tailwind CSS, defines a white-and-orange design token palette, and includes custom component/utility classes for badges, animations, and layout.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider into the DOM root.
frontend/src/pages/CourierApp.tsx: Courier dashboard page that displays and manages all orders with filtering, optimistic status updates, and delete functionality, gated behind a PIN access check and also includes a menu management tab.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerPortal.tsx: Customer-facing portal page that renders the menu, cart, checkout, order confirmation, and account views, handling navigation state and triggering profile setup for new authenticated users.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with helpers to persist/retrieve values via sessionStorage and clean sensitive params from the URL bar.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom colors (including orange palette and semantic tokens), fonts (Sora/Inter), border radii, box shadows, and keyframe animations; also registers tailwindcss-animate, typography, and container-queries plugins.
project_state.json: Project state snapshot (version 33) describing two standalone frontend apps (Customer Portal and Courier App) sharing one Motoko backend, listing architectural notes, known bugs (e.g., silent add-item failures, missing order persistence, admin auth issues), and the full set of implemented features.
